etymology.interpretation: Built with 八 as the semantic element and 向 as the phonetic, aligning with their Old Chinese readings. 八 gives a general semantic tag while 向 contributes the shàng sound; the overall layout is similar to 冋.

examples.chinese: 事情尚未结束(事情尚未結束)。
examples.english: The matter is not over yet.

examples.chinese: 他尚年轻(他尚年輕)，需要指导(需要指導)。
examples.english: He is still young and needs guidance.

examples.chinese: 他崇尚简约的生活方式(他崇尚簡約的生活方式)。
examples.pinyin: Tā chóngshàng jiǎnyuē de shēnghuó fāngshì.
